summary: Nothing Is Forever 5
title: Nothing Is Forever 5
body:
Pairing: Steve Rogers x Sick!Reader

Warning: Reader has a life threatening illness. Mentions of wanting to die. Hospital trips. Seriously sick moments. Mentions of miscarriage. Mentions of losing baby. Language. Self hate. Secrets. Sass, lots of sass.

A/N: Reader is Peter’s sister, They’re adopted by Tony and Pepper, who have Howie as well. So She’s Peter and Howie’s younger sister. Just a heads up.

When you’re sixteen you think everything is going to last forever. But sadly nothing last forever, not promises and not life. Especially not secrets and lies. The truth always comes out and things always come to an end.
Your history with Steve Rogers, the past the two of you share is thick and heavy. The memories you have together, they were scarred into your body. But like everything else it came crashing down on you. You lied as the two of drifted apart, carrying your own pain.
Eight years later, you’re life was built around lies and fakes smiles. The line ‘things are fine’ was how you kept others at bay. It was better this way. Till Steve Rogers comes crashing back into your life. How long can things stay buried? Lies.
Secrets.
Memories.
Truth.
Feelings.
It’s a second chance, but you can’t have what you want.
You can’t destroy Steve with your secret life.

Steve: Hey gorgeous. Hope your nights good. Seeing you, it’s stuck in my head now. Not to sound heavy, but it all came rushing back. I wonder if you remember the silly string fights? The countless football games? Spring break Jr. year? I was thinking about the first time we met tonight. I remember the way you smiled at me. It was so different from today. Yet the same in so many ways. I’m rambling, guess you still have that effect on me.


You: Hey love. Seeing you, wow. You ever need something so bad, but you don’t know you need it till it happens? If that makes sense, I guess. You mean the week of hell? Nat and Buck broke up. She spent the whole trip crying, drunk and throwing up. God, I can’t stop laughing now. How do you still do that, after all this time? Make me laugh when I’m lying on rock bottom. Of course I remember that day, it changed my whole life. I smiled at you, and you lit up like you won the Jackpot. Tell me something about you from the last eight years. Something about you, I don’t know.


Steve: No, that makes sense, I get that. I think that’s how it was for me too. Buck was no better. He was drunk, angry and throwing up, it was a long week. Are you okay? I mean, I know it’s been a long time, but you know I’ll do anything to make you smile. That’s cause, when you smiled at me, I felt like I won the Jackpot. That’s how it always felt with you. As long as you were smiling everything in the world was right. Something about me, wow not much has changed. It’s getting late, and I’m sure you’re falling asleep. Guess something about me would be, I’m still hopelessly in love with you. You’re still the only girl for me, you’re still my girl, eight years later.
If you have a boyfriend, he better be ready for a fight. I’m not walking away again. I love you Y/N and I’m never going to stop.

Your hands shake as you set your phone on the bed. Your body flushes warm, your throat tightens. You were going to be sick. You manage to get to your feet, shuffling across the bedroom floor. Your heart felt like it was going to burst from your chest and skitter across the wood floor.

Your breath came short and staggered. The room didn’t shift, and it didn’t spin, it was just as if someone flipped the light off. Your body went limp, dropping to the bedroom floor with a audible thump. Your bedroom door flew open moments after.




“Y/N?!” Howie rushes in, dropping to the ground next to his sister. He rolls her over, checking her pulse. “Peter!” He yells, his voice frantic and scared. Hurried footsteps rush down the hallway, before Peter was dropping to the ground next to him and their sisters unconscious body.

“What happened?” Peter brushes her hair back from her face, putting his ear up to her nose and mouth.

“I just heard her collapse.” Howie shakes his head.

“I’ll grab her tank, you call the doctor.” Peter nods, pushing himself up off the floor. Howie fumbles for his phone in his sweatpants pocket.




You could feel the tube, it laced itself around your ears, and tickled your nose. Your lungs gave a raspy breathe in your chest. It was too bright to be home, the smell of hospital hit you, followed with the sound of a heart monitor and the faint paging of doctors from the hall. Your eyes open, Howie sat in the chair, pulled close to your bedside. His hands in his hair, his head hung, his elbows on the edge of your bed.

“Whoa.” You croak. Trying to piece together how you got to the hospital.

“Hey,” Howie looks up, relief floods his face, his eyes blood shot “you’re awake.” He sound close to tears.

“What happened?” You blink, patting the bed for his hand. You could feel the IV jammed into your vein and taped down on your hand.

“Um you blacked out.” Howie swallows, squeezing your fingers.

“How did we get here?” You look around. Did you black out all night? It typically only lasted a short while.

“Bip,” Howie’s brow pulls together “you blacked out two days ago.” His bottom lip trembled.

“Fuck, no.” You grip his fingers.

“Breathe, Bip. Stay calm.” He moves, sitting on the edge of the bed.

“Howie.” Your eyes well up and your voice cracks.

“Shush.” He shakes his head, he kisses the top of your head, his hands smoothing over your cheek and hair. “It’s okay.” He mumbles into your hair. “You’re okay.” He sounded more like he was reassuring himself than you.

“Mae? Is she okay?” You look up panicked at your brother.

“She’s scared. She woke up, it was a mess.” He nods.

“Fuck I need to see her.” You swallow the lump in your throat.

“I’ll pick her up and bring her over for you.” He nods.

“Howie, my phone?” You ask, looking around. He nods, standing up he pulls your phone from his pocket.

“I have it. You have a bunch of unread texts.” He hands it over.

You’d been texting Steve. Steve’s confessional text message, you left him on read. Your body sags with regret. He was probably going nuts, or heart broken. Why did it always come down to you hurting him?

“Thanks How.” You glance at your phone, unsure what you were going to say to Steve. How did you explain your disappearance? You couldn’t tell him the truth, there was too much buried with your lie.

“You two texting?” Howie asks, sitting on the edge of the bed again.

“Who?” Your lips tremble as you look up from your phone.

“Are you an owl now?” He smirks at you. “The only person in the world I know that makes your lips do that tremble thing they do.”

“Why does it always come down to me having to hurt him?” You look from your phone to Howie.

“Why do you have to hurt him?” His head tips and you hated the way he was reading you.

“Because I can’t destroy him the way I am you and Peter. I can’t give him front row seats to watch me die, Howie. He can’t know everything that happened, with her,” your eyes well up, tears slip slowly down your cheeks “was all my fault. That I’m to blame. I can’t destroy him like that.” You swallow, brushing at the tears.

“Nothing is your fault Y/N. If you don’t want to give him front row seats, than start fighting.” His tone serious, you refuse to meet his eye.

trail.content:
Pairing: Steve Rogers x Sick!Reader

Warning: Reader has a life threatening illness. Mentions of wanting to die. Hospital trips. Seriously sick moments. Mentions of miscarriage. Mentions of losing baby. Language. Self hate. Secrets. Sass, lots of sass.

A/N: Reader is Peter’s sister, They’re adopted by Tony and Pepper, who have Howie as well. So She’s Peter and Howie’s younger sister. Just a heads up.

When you’re sixteen you think everything is going to last forever. But sadly nothing last forever, not promises and not life. Especially not secrets and lies. The truth always comes out and things always come to an end.
Your history with Steve Rogers, the past the two of you share is thick and heavy. The memories you have together, they were scarred into your body. But like everything else it came crashing down on you. You lied as the two of drifted apart, carrying your own pain.
Eight years later, you’re life was built around lies and fakes smiles. The line ‘things are fine’ was how you kept others at bay. It was better this way. Till Steve Rogers comes crashing back into your life. How long can things stay buried? Lies.
Secrets.
Memories.
Truth.
Feelings.
It’s a second chance, but you can’t have what you want.
You can’t destroy Steve with your secret life.

Steve: Hey gorgeous. Hope your nights good. Seeing you, it’s stuck in my head now. Not to sound heavy, but it all came rushing back. I wonder if you remember the silly string fights? The countless football games? Spring break Jr. year? I was thinking about the first time we met tonight. I remember the way you smiled at me. It was so different from today. Yet the same in so many ways. I’m rambling, guess you still have that effect on me.


You: Hey love. Seeing you, wow. You ever need something so bad, but you don’t know you need it till it happens? If that makes sense, I guess. You mean the week of hell? Nat and Buck broke up. She spent the whole trip crying, drunk and throwing up. God, I can’t stop laughing now. How do you still do that, after all this time? Make me laugh when I’m lying on rock bottom. Of course I remember that day, it changed my whole life. I smiled at you, and you lit up like you won the Jackpot. Tell me something about you from the last eight years. Something about you, I don’t know.


Steve: No, that makes sense, I get that. I think that’s how it was for me too. Buck was no better. He was drunk, angry and throwing up, it was a long week. Are you okay? I mean, I know it’s been a long time, but you know I’ll do anything to make you smile. That’s cause, when you smiled at me, I felt like I won the Jackpot. That’s how it always felt with you. As long as you were smiling everything in the world was right. Something about me, wow not much has changed. It’s getting late, and I’m sure you’re falling asleep. Guess something about me would be, I’m still hopelessly in love with you. You’re still the only girl for me, you’re still my girl, eight years later.
If you have a boyfriend, he better be ready for a fight. I’m not walking away again. I love you Y/N and I’m never going to stop.

Your hands shake as you set your phone on the bed. Your body flushes warm, your throat tightens. You were going to be sick. You manage to get to your feet, shuffling across the bedroom floor. Your heart felt like it was going to burst from your chest and skitter across the wood floor.

Your breath came short and staggered. The room didn’t shift, and it didn’t spin, it was just as if someone flipped the light off. Your body went limp, dropping to the bedroom floor with a audible thump. Your bedroom door flew open moments after.




“Y/N?!” Howie rushes in, dropping to the ground next to his sister. He rolls her over, checking her pulse. “Peter!” He yells, his voice frantic and scared. Hurried footsteps rush down the hallway, before Peter was dropping to the ground next to him and their sisters unconscious body.

“What happened?” Peter brushes her hair back from her face, putting his ear up to her nose and mouth.

“I just heard her collapse.” Howie shakes his head.

“I’ll grab her tank, you call the doctor.” Peter nods, pushing himself up off the floor. Howie fumbles for his phone in his sweatpants pocket.




You could feel the tube, it laced itself around your ears, and tickled your nose. Your lungs gave a raspy breathe in your chest. It was too bright to be home, the smell of hospital hit you, followed with the sound of a heart monitor and the faint paging of doctors from the hall. Your eyes open, Howie sat in the chair, pulled close to your bedside. His hands in his hair, his head hung, his elbows on the edge of your bed.

“Whoa.” You croak. Trying to piece together how you got to the hospital.

“Hey,” Howie looks up, relief floods his face, his eyes blood shot “you’re awake.” He sound close to tears.

“What happened?” You blink, patting the bed for his hand. You could feel the IV jammed into your vein and taped down on your hand.

“Um you blacked out.” Howie swallows, squeezing your fingers.

“How did we get here?” You look around. Did you black out all night? It typically only lasted a short while.

“Bip,” Howie’s brow pulls together “you blacked out two days ago.” His bottom lip trembled.

“Fuck, no.” You grip his fingers.

“Breathe, Bip. Stay calm.” He moves, sitting on the edge of the bed.

“Howie.” Your eyes well up and your voice cracks.

“Shush.” He shakes his head, he kisses the top of your head, his hands smoothing over your cheek and hair. “It’s okay.” He mumbles into your hair. “You’re okay.” He sounded more like he was reassuring himself than you.

“Mae? Is she okay?” You look up panicked at your brother.

“She’s scared. She woke up, it was a mess.” He nods.

“Fuck I need to see her.” You swallow the lump in your throat.

“I’ll pick her up and bring her over for you.” He nods.

“Howie, my phone?” You ask, looking around. He nods, standing up he pulls your phone from his pocket.

“I have it. You have a bunch of unread texts.” He hands it over.

You’d been texting Steve. Steve’s confessional text message, you left him on read. Your body sags with regret. He was probably going nuts, or heart broken. Why did it always come down to you hurting him?

“Thanks How.” You glance at your phone, unsure what you were going to say to Steve. How did you explain your disappearance? You couldn’t tell him the truth, there was too much buried with your lie.

“You two texting?” Howie asks, sitting on the edge of the bed again.

“Who?” Your lips tremble as you look up from your phone.

“Are you an owl now?” He smirks at you. “The only person in the world I know that makes your lips do that tremble thing they do.”

“Why does it always come down to me having to hurt him?” You look from your phone to Howie.

“Why do you have to hurt him?” His head tips and you hated the way he was reading you.

“Because I can’t destroy him the way I am you and Peter. I can’t give him front row seats to watch me die, Howie. He can’t know everything that happened, with her,” your eyes well up, tears slip slowly down your cheeks “was all my fault. That I’m to blame. I can’t destroy him like that.” You swallow, brushing at the tears.

“Nothing is your fault Y/N. If you don’t want to give him front row seats, than start fighting.” His tone serious, you refuse to meet his eye.

summary: These characters had personalities.    Quirks, flaws, tempers.  The heroes were not all good, the villains were not all bad....
text:
These characters had personalities.    Quirks, flaws, tempers.  The heroes were not all good, the villains were not all bad.  The stories had twists and turns, I could not tell where they were going.  Sometimes good guys fought other good guys.   The characters grew and changed… over at DC, Superman and Lois Lane had been locked into the same relationship for decades, but Peter Parker went through girlfriends like a real teenager, he graduated high school and went to college, people could and did die.

You had to be there to understand how revolutionary all this was.  Comics as we know them today would not exist except for Stan Lee.   They might not exist at all, if truth be told.
source:
George R.R. Martin paying tribute to Stan Lee in his non-blog.

Lee’s influence on GRRM is more discernible when you read that in the context of Game of Thrones.

X-Force ran from 1991-2004 following New Mutants

summary: pt1) New Years day 2026. NYC. You're established as an actress, you’ve a few good leading lady rolls under your belt. You were...
question: pt1) New Years day 2026. NYC. You're established as an actress, you’ve a few good leading lady rolls under your belt. You were at a private party in a skyscraper that overlooks the ball as it drops. Now you were on your way to your hotel. The streets were cleared of all the people celebrating the new year. Glitter and confetti litter the floor and you kick at it as you strut through in your heels. "Hey isn't that Jasmine L/N?" You look up to see a group of men staring you down.
answer:
pt2) You look around for police or security. There were a million of them earlier. There seemed to be none now. You pull your hood up tighter around your face and try to rush on. Your hotel is only but a block away. “I think it is!” “Hey, girl, how about a selfie? A signature?” “How about I give you my signature?” Another asks and you can see him grab himself hard through is jeans out of the corner of your eye. “Where do you think you’re going?” One of them reaches out for your arm. When

Pt3) A web flings past you and wraps around the guy. The force of it drops him to the ground. You turn your head in time to see Spiderman swinging by you. He drops from his web between you and the other guys. “I think the lady’s had bigger and better signatures.” The other guys scramble back. “Hey wait!” He picks up their web-tied friend. “Don’t forget your buddy!” He tosses him at them. He turns to you and, “Oh my God! You’re Jasmine L/N!”

pt4) The eyes on his suit widen. He’s starstruck and starts going on about how he loved you in one of your latest movies. He said he’s followed you since your debut in a little indie movie that you yourself were quite proud of. He says he had a magazine of you that he always kept in his college dorm. But he’s quick to stutter and brush that off as, “That sounds bad but it wasn’t like that. Not that you aren’t gorgeous it’s just that he’s not a creep. Unless that’s actually flattering,

pt5) in which case maybe? No. wait. No. I didn’t.” You laugh and he finally stops talking. He asks for a selfie. “With you in the suit?” You ask. He says, “Definitely.” and you agree. He proceeds to walk with you to your hotel. Only when you get there he seems like he doesn’t want to leave. He’s met many famous heroes but it’s his first time meeting a big movie star. “You’re a sweet kid.” You say, giving him a peck on the cheek. His suit’s eyes go wider than you thought possible.

pt6) “I’m doing press here for the next few days. Maybe I’ll see you again.” The next day you have a rather boring day of press. That is until your last interview. A guy by the name of Peter Parker from the Daily Bugle. He says he’s just a photographer but begged one of his co-workers to let him have this interview. There’s something in the way he talks that you just know. You end up asking him out to dinner. He enthusiastically accepts. And that’s how you start dating Spiderman. (end)

WHOEVER DID THIS I LOVE YOU 😭😭😭😭

blog.name: avengers-familyimagines
blog.title: Avengers Family Imagines
blog.description: I write platonic and romantic imagines and fics! involving the Avengers and other Marvel characters. Feel free to request something! Just as a heads up, Imagines I write are small things that are short and sweet and aren’t very descriptive while my Fics are more detailed and story-like.

summary: Imagine spending Christmas with the Avengers
body:
Imagine spending Christmas with the Avengers

Request: Hey there! I absolutely love your imagines❤❤. So can I request one? Like when avengers are spending christmas together and give each other super funny presents. Of course everything goes wild and y/n breaks her leg and they all freak out. You can change the plot if you don’t like it. (Did I mention ily?😍) — Anonymous

Author’s Note: I wanted to say thank you so much for all the love! I’m so happy you enjoy my imagines! It makes me so happy! I loved making this imagine, but I sadly couldn’t work in the broken leg scenario. I tried really hard for the funny presents, though! Feel free to request more!

Tony was normally not a holiday enjoyer, partly due to the fact he never had anyone to spend it with other than girls he managed to get into his bed. He hadn’t realized how much everything had changed since then, now standing within a team of Earth’s mightiest heroes while simultaneously trying his hardest to be a good father to Y/N, who had joined the picture not long after he was Iron Man. Nowadays, the tower was somehow coated in green and red lights that glimmered from the city’s help, every floor in said tower having at least two Christmas trees all decorated by each of the heroes, himself, or Y/N.

Nevertheless, Tony felt Christmases were much better now, holding Pepper close as he watched his, well…family enjoy each other’s company. Thor finally managed to convince everybody to allow Loki to appear as well. Clint brought his entire family, every year coming adorned in ugly Christmas sweaters for tradition. Bruce and Natasha kept, somehow, finding each other underneath the mistletoe(Bucky and Sam did, too, much to their displeasure). Steve always overdid it with the presents, wanting to put so much effort into every gift for everyone. T'Challa and Shuri tried their best to make appearances, but as a monarch and an influence for Wakanda, they struggled to. (Although, they never missed a chance to upstage Tony in his extravagant gifts). Stephen always said he only came because he had nothing better to do, yet he was always the first guest to arrive. Wanda and Vision always showed up wearing cheesy, matching couple outfits. And, finally, Peter always managed to slip away once his Christmas with Aunt May and Ned were done to visit the Avengers. Overall, Tony thought it was perfect.

This Christmas, however, everyone was there. Everyone arrived with armfuls of gifts and food, while others brought some old Christmas movies they thought the heroes would enjoy. Soon enough, the topmost floor was full with all the heroes and Y/N alike, conversations booming across everyone.

Y/N was, as always, speaking quietly with a blushing Peter and amused Shuri as she waved her arms exaggeratingly, her right hand clasped around a cup of eggnog. She was having such a good time as she laughed with them.

“Let’s set a wager, then, Stark girl,” Shuri grinned. “I’ll bet the White Wolf and Falcon will be caught underneath the mistletoe at least four more times.”

“I think it’ll just be one more time,” Peter disagreed, eyeing the two in bemusement. Bucky was sitting, pouting more like, with his arms crossed on the sofa while Loki sat beside him, relishing in the man’s grumpiness as he offered him a Christmas cookie. Sam had downed four glasses of ‘Adult Eggnog’ to try to get the taste out of his mouth since he had been forced to kiss Bucky three times from the stupid mistletoe.

“I say just two more before Bucky decides he’ll start bringing Steve around with him everywhere so Steve can kiss Sam instead,” Y/N guessed, pointing to the blond who was watching blank faced as Thor danced aggressively to the Christmas music playing from the radio.

“Winner gets what?” Shuri asked.

“Fine. If I win, you have to build me a blaster like I’ve been begging you to,” Y/N demanded.

“Ooh, ooh! If I win, we have to have a sleepover at Wakanda!” Peter jumped up and down.

“And if I win, you sign the Stark tower to my brother and we get to evict you,” Shuri demanded, suddenly serious.

“Wait, what?”

“Ha! Only joking! You should’ve seen your face!” Shuri snickered before throwing a friendly arm over her shoulders as well as Peter’s. “Nah, if I win, you guys have to watch a show of my choice with me until the series ends.”

“Deal,” Y/N and Peter agreed.

“Okay, everyone!” Steve suddenly called, looking appalled at Thor’s dancing. He figured this would be a way to get it to finally stop. “Presents!”

As the three walked over, they could see Bucky and Sam also making their way over, unfortunately falling back to the mistletoe again and letting out distressed cries. Everyone else laughed as the two cursed loudly before pecking each other on the lips. Finally, they marched towards the tree to meet their third friend who was doubled over in laughter.

“If they do it one more time, Parker, you’re out,” Shuri reminded, prodding him on the forehead playfully before she went to meet her brother at the tree who was laughing with Y/N’s father about something. Finally, everyone arrived, sitting criss-cross with their families so it’d be easier to pass the presents around.

Thor and Loki sat beside each other, Thor looking very excited and Loki very bored. Clint sat with his family, his wife leaning against him with a soft smile. Natasha and Bruce ended up sitting beside each other, discreetly hiding their interlocked hands. T'Challa, of course, sat with Shuri nearest the tree. Steve sat in the middle of Sam and Bucky, both of which looked very annoyed. Stephen was going to sit by himself, but Wanda and Vision insisted he sit with them. And last, there was the Stark family, Tony kissing his daughter’s forehead before he sat beside her with Pepper on the other, also giving her step-daughter a kiss on the forehead. Peter, blushing, went to join them as he got Y/N’s other side, smiling crookedly at her.

“Okay, let’s get started,” Steve smiled, clapping his hands together as he grabbed the first gift. It looked as if it were wrapped by a toddler, since it crinkled around all the edges and there was far too much tape than was actually needed. “This one is for, uh…Spider-Child. From Thor.” Thor looked proud as Steve handed it to Peter. Y/N snorted behind her hand, but she hid it with a cough.

On and on it went, everybody waiting until everyone had their gifts. You could really tell who wrapped what since Thor’s weren’t the best, Steve’s had precision, and Natasha wrote little notes on hers for everyone. Even Loki had received three presents(they were from Thor, Steve, and Y/N).

“Okay, why don’t we go around and each open one? Bucky, you start,” Steve said, nudging him slightly. The brunette nodded and picked up Steve’s first, gently shaking it near his ear before he carefully peeled off the blue wrapping paper, finally getting down to a large brown box. He looked confused at first before he opened the box and grinned. “Hoodies! And they’re all…they’re Avenger hoodies…”

“Show us, Cyborg,” Tony called. He still struggled to speak to him, but Y/N was glad to see he was still trying with Bucky, which both she and Steve really appreciated. Bucky nodded and pulled out one that was a dark green with black lettering on the front that read, 'You won’t like me when I’m angry’. Bruce sighed heavily and covered his red face. Natasha laughed as she nudged him. Bucky pulled out another for them to see, this one red and blue with a black spider on the front.

“No way! You got a Spiderman hoodie? I didn’t even know they made those! That’s so cool!” Peter exclaimed, nearly jumping to his feet if it weren’t for Y/N holding him down. Bucky looked very happy about his new clothes as he sat down, still clutching the Hulk and Spiderman hoodies to his chest. He elbowed Steve playfully and thanked him.

“Alright, it’s your turn, Cap,” Tony smiled.

“Oh, okay! Uh…this one is from…Y/N!” Steve smiled as he pulled up a lavender wrapped present. He opened it quickly and looked at the plastic wrapped package. He looked excited. “The Harry Potter movies!”

“Yeah, I know you really liked the books when I showed you, so I figured you should see the movies, too,” Y/N nodded.

“Awesome, thank you!” Steve smiled, before pausing, “How do I play them?”

“Alright, alright, it’s my turn!” Sam demanded, taking the attention to himself as he grabbed a present from Bucky. It was small and rectangular shaped. He opened it and held it up so he could read the words on the front. To everyone else, it appeared to be just a regular book. That is, until Sam revealed what it was about, “The Mating Lives of Birds…by James Parry.” He slowly turned to Bucky, who seemed to be trying to curb his instant laughter.

Sam squinted as he gripped the book harshly. “I hate you.”

“My turn!” Thor declared, unaware of the newfound tension between the two frenemies. He lifted a gold wrapped gift. “From Stark!” He opened it quickly and gasped at what appeared inside. “It says Trojan on the front! That must mean it is mighty!” It was a tiny box. Clint suddenly jumped and blocked his daughter’s eyes, his wife doing the same for their baby. Loki looked confused as he grabbed the small box and read it aloud, “Trojan condoms…it is protection for…why would you gift him this, Stark?”

“Thought he was with that Valkyrie chick or whatever,” Tony shrugged. “Thought he might wanna use 'em.”

“She needs no protection. She is very strong. But thank you,” Thor smiled, taking his 'gift’ back and setting them down.

Loki rolled his eyes and went next, opening the gift Y/N had gotten him. “Hm…they are Harry Potter books? Aren’t these what you had given Steve?”

“Nah. He already read the books. He got the movies. Thought you would wanna read 'em next.” Y/N shrugged.

Loki nodded slowly as he glared down at them. Finally, he grunted a gruff, “Thank you.”

Peter smiled and went next. “Okay! So this one is from…Mr. Stark!” His eyes suddenly gained a spark in them as he ripped open his gift and looked at what it was. “No way! No way! No way!”

“What? What is it?” Y/N asked in eagerness to see what her father had gotten him. He wouldn’t even let her see it.

“It’s the LEGO Star Wars: Betrayal at Cloud City set! It’s 350 dollars! I’ve been saving up so me and Ned could…” he trailed off with a red face as he realized everyone was watching him. “It’s just…I really like it. Thank you…Mr. Stark.” Tony chortled and patted him across the back gingerly.

“You’re welcome, kid. Y/N, it’s your turn.”

Y/N nodded and looked over her gifts, deciding which one she should open. “I’ll open Peter’s.”

Peter’s eyes widened as he looked away from his LEGO set to her, waving his arm frantically. “Wait, wait, wait! You could wait to open that one, really! I can’t…you shouldn’t…” His blush deepened as she opened the small gift and popped open the box, her own eyes widened as she looked at what was inside.

“It’s…my name….on a necklace.” Y/N said, pulling out the silver jewelry and holding it for everyone to see. “Oh, wow…Peter, it’s…it’s beautiful. Thank you.” She smiled and pulled him close to press a kiss to his cheek. Tony looked pointedly away, but he didn’t stop them.

From there on, several more gifts were opened and everyone enjoyed them all. Although, Sam was still put out from Bucky’s gift. He got his revenge, though, when Bucky opened the gift from him and just found a box full of refrigerator magnets for his arm. Nevertheless, everyone got what they wanted and they were all so happy. Tony had gotten Y/N a necklace, too, though this one was a locket. On the inside had two pictures on either side of the heart charm. One was of Tony grinning cockily and the other with Pepper giving a gentle smile. Y/N loved it. Upon the end of the gift opening, she was wearing both of her new necklaces, Bucky was wearing a Captain America hoodie, Sam was thumbing through his new book, Thor had finally realized what Tony’s present was, and Loki had already propped open the first book and began reading, already enthralled with J.K. Rowling’s work.

On the way back to other activities, Sam and Bucky had been caught under the mistletoe AGAIN, throwing Peter out of the running and skyrocketing Y/N to the winning circle since the two of them marched over to Steve after their next kiss in order to drag him around with them in case.

“Guess you’ll be getting that blaster after all!” Shuri laughed. “Thankfully, I had already built it. I was gonna give it to you on your birthday, but this works, too.”

“Oh, it definitely works for me,” Y/N giggled, thumbing at the necklace Peter had given her. Overall, this was a fantastic Christmas…

On and on it went, everybody waiting until everyone had their gifts. You could really tell who wrapped what since Thor’s weren’t the best, Steve’s had precision, and Natasha wrote little notes on hers for everyone. Even Loki had received three presents(they were from Thor, Steve, and Y/N).

“Okay, why don’t we go around and each open one? Bucky, you start,” Steve said, nudging him slightly. The brunette nodded and picked up Steve’s first, gently shaking it near his ear before he carefully peeled off the blue wrapping paper, finally getting down to a large brown box. He looked confused at first before he opened the box and grinned. “Hoodies! And they’re all…they’re Avenger hoodies…”

“Show us, Cyborg,” Tony called. He still struggled to speak to him, but Y/N was glad to see he was still trying with Bucky, which both she and Steve really appreciated. Bucky nodded and pulled out one that was a dark green with black lettering on the front that read, 'You won’t like me when I’m angry’. Bruce sighed heavily and covered his red face. Natasha laughed as she nudged him. Bucky pulled out another for them to see, this one red and blue with a black spider on the front.

“No way! You got a Spiderman hoodie? I didn’t even know they made those! That’s so cool!” Peter exclaimed, nearly jumping to his feet if it weren’t for Y/N holding him down. Bucky looked very happy about his new clothes as he sat down, still clutching the Hulk and Spiderman hoodies to his chest. He elbowed Steve playfully and thanked him.

“Alright, it’s your turn, Cap,” Tony smiled.

“Oh, okay! Uh…this one is from…Y/N!” Steve smiled as he pulled up a lavender wrapped present. He opened it quickly and looked at the plastic wrapped package. He looked excited. “The Harry Potter movies!”

“Yeah, I know you really liked the books when I showed you, so I figured you should see the movies, too,” Y/N nodded.

“Awesome, thank you!” Steve smiled, before pausing, “How do I play them?”

“Alright, alright, it’s my turn!” Sam demanded, taking the attention to himself as he grabbed a present from Bucky. It was small and rectangular shaped. He opened it and held it up so he could read the words on the front. To everyone else, it appeared to be just a regular book. That is, until Sam revealed what it was about, “The Mating Lives of Birds…by James Parry.” He slowly turned to Bucky, who seemed to be trying to curb his instant laughter.

Sam squinted as he gripped the book harshly. “I hate you.”

“My turn!” Thor declared, unaware of the newfound tension between the two frenemies. He lifted a gold wrapped gift. “From Stark!” He opened it quickly and gasped at what appeared inside. “It says Trojan on the front! That must mean it is mighty!” It was a tiny box. Clint suddenly jumped and blocked his daughter’s eyes, his wife doing the same for their baby. Loki looked confused as he grabbed the small box and read it aloud, “Trojan condoms…it is protection for…why would you gift him this, Stark?”

“Thought he was with that Valkyrie chick or whatever,” Tony shrugged. “Thought he might wanna use 'em.”

“She needs no protection. She is very strong. But thank you,” Thor smiled, taking his 'gift’ back and setting them down.

Loki rolled his eyes and went next, opening the gift Y/N had gotten him. “Hm…they are Harry Potter books? Aren’t these what you had given Steve?”

“Nah. He already read the books. He got the movies. Thought you would wanna read 'em next.” Y/N shrugged.

Loki nodded slowly as he glared down at them. Finally, he grunted a gruff, “Thank you.”

Peter smiled and went next. “Okay! So this one is from…Mr. Stark!” His eyes suddenly gained a spark in them as he ripped open his gift and looked at what it was. “No way! No way! No way!”

“What? What is it?” Y/N asked in eagerness to see what her father had gotten him. He wouldn’t even let her see it.

“It’s the LEGO Star Wars: Betrayal at Cloud City set! It’s 350 dollars! I’ve been saving up so me and Ned could…” he trailed off with a red face as he realized everyone was watching him. “It’s just…I really like it. Thank you…Mr. Stark.” Tony chortled and patted him across the back gingerly.

“You’re welcome, kid. Y/N, it’s your turn.”

Y/N nodded and looked over her gifts, deciding which one she should open. “I’ll open Peter’s.”

Peter’s eyes widened as he looked away from his LEGO set to her, waving his arm frantically. “Wait, wait, wait! You could wait to open that one, really! I can’t…you shouldn’t…” His blush deepened as she opened the small gift and popped open the box, her own eyes widened as she looked at what was inside.

“It’s…my name….on a necklace.” Y/N said, pulling out the silver jewelry and holding it for everyone to see. “Oh, wow…Peter, it’s…it’s beautiful. Thank you.” She smiled and pulled him close to press a kiss to his cheek. Tony looked pointedly away, but he didn’t stop them.

From there on, several more gifts were opened and everyone enjoyed them all. Although, Sam was still put out from Bucky’s gift. He got his revenge, though, when Bucky opened the gift from him and just found a box full of refrigerator magnets for his arm. Nevertheless, everyone got what they wanted and they were all so happy. Tony had gotten Y/N a necklace, too, though this one was a locket. On the inside had two pictures on either side of the heart charm. One was of Tony grinning cockily and the other with Pepper giving a gentle smile. Y/N loved it. Upon the end of the gift opening, she was wearing both of her new necklaces, Bucky was wearing a Captain America hoodie, Sam was thumbing through his new book, Thor had finally realized what Tony’s present was, and Loki had already propped open the first book and began reading, already enthralled with J.K. Rowling’s work.

On the way back to other activities, Sam and Bucky had been caught under the mistletoe AGAIN, throwing Peter out of the running and skyrocketing Y/N to the winning circle since the two of them marched over to Steve after their next kiss in order to drag him around with them in case.

“Guess you’ll be getting that blaster after all!” Shuri laughed. “Thankfully, I had already built it. I was gonna give it to you on your birthday, but this works, too.”

“Oh, it definitely works for me,” Y/N giggled, thumbing at the necklace Peter had given her. Overall, this was a fantastic Christmas…

Tony was normally not a holiday enjoyer, partly due to the fact he never had anyone to spend it with other than girls he managed to get into his bed. He hadn’t realized how much everything had changed since then, now standing within a team of Earth’s mightiest heroes while simultaneously trying his hardest to be a good father to Y/N, who had joined the picture not long after he was Iron Man. Nowadays, the tower was somehow coated in green and red lights that glimmered from the city’s help, every floor in said tower having at least two Christmas trees all decorated by each of the heroes, himself, or Y/N.

Nevertheless, Tony felt Christmases were much better now, holding Pepper close as he watched his, well…family enjoy each other’s company. Thor finally managed to convince everybody to allow Loki to appear as well. Clint brought his entire family, every year coming adorned in ugly Christmas sweaters for tradition. Bruce and Natasha kept, somehow, finding each other underneath the mistletoe(Bucky and Sam did, too, much to their displeasure). Steve always overdid it with the presents, wanting to put so much effort into every gift for everyone. T'Challa and Shuri tried their best to make appearances, but as a monarch and an influence for Wakanda, they struggled to. (Although, they never missed a chance to upstage Tony in his extravagant gifts). Stephen always said he only came because he had nothing better to do, yet he was always the first guest to arrive. Wanda and Vision always showed up wearing cheesy, matching couple outfits. And, finally, Peter always managed to slip away once his Christmas with Aunt May and Ned were done to visit the Avengers. Overall, Tony thought it was perfect.

This Christmas, however, everyone was there. Everyone arrived with armfuls of gifts and food, while others brought some old Christmas movies they thought the heroes would enjoy. Soon enough, the topmost floor was full with all the heroes and Y/N alike, conversations booming across everyone.

Y/N was, as always, speaking quietly with a blushing Peter and amused Shuri as she waved her arms exaggeratingly, her right hand clasped around a cup of eggnog. She was having such a good time as she laughed with them.

“Let’s set a wager, then, Stark girl,” Shuri grinned. “I’ll bet the White Wolf and Falcon will be caught underneath the mistletoe at least four more times.”

“I think it’ll just be one more time,” Peter disagreed, eyeing the two in bemusement. Bucky was sitting, pouting more like, with his arms crossed on the sofa while Loki sat beside him, relishing in the man’s grumpiness as he offered him a Christmas cookie. Sam had downed four glasses of ‘Adult Eggnog’ to try to get the taste out of his mouth since he had been forced to kiss Bucky three times from the stupid mistletoe.

“I say just two more before Bucky decides he’ll start bringing Steve around with him everywhere so Steve can kiss Sam instead,” Y/N guessed, pointing to the blond who was watching blank faced as Thor danced aggressively to the Christmas music playing from the radio.

“Winner gets what?” Shuri asked.

“Fine. If I win, you have to build me a blaster like I’ve been begging you to,” Y/N demanded.

“Ooh, ooh! If I win, we have to have a sleepover at Wakanda!” Peter jumped up and down.

“And if I win, you sign the Stark tower to my brother and we get to evict you,” Shuri demanded, suddenly serious.

“Wait, what?”

“Ha! Only joking! You should’ve seen your face!” Shuri snickered before throwing a friendly arm over her shoulders as well as Peter’s. “Nah, if I win, you guys have to watch a show of my choice with me until the series ends.”

“Deal,” Y/N and Peter agreed.

“Okay, everyone!” Steve suddenly called, looking appalled at Thor’s dancing. He figured this would be a way to get it to finally stop. “Presents!”

As the three walked over, they could see Bucky and Sam also making their way over, unfortunately falling back to the mistletoe again and letting out distressed cries. Everyone else laughed as the two cursed loudly before pecking each other on the lips. Finally, they marched towards the tree to meet their third friend who was doubled over in laughter.

“If they do it one more time, Parker, you’re out,” Shuri reminded, prodding him on the forehead playfully before she went to meet her brother at the tree who was laughing with Y/N’s father about something. Finally, everyone arrived, sitting criss-cross with their families so it’d be easier to pass the presents around.

Thor and Loki sat beside each other, Thor looking very excited and Loki very bored. Clint sat with his family, his wife leaning against him with a soft smile. Natasha and Bruce ended up sitting beside each other, discreetly hiding their interlocked hands. T'Challa, of course, sat with Shuri nearest the tree. Steve sat in the middle of Sam and Bucky, both of which looked very annoyed. Stephen was going to sit by himself, but Wanda and Vision insisted he sit with them. And last, there was the Stark family, Tony kissing his daughter’s forehead before he sat beside her with Pepper on the other, also giving her step-daughter a kiss on the forehead. Peter, blushing, went to join them as he got Y/N’s other side, smiling crookedly at her.

“Okay, let’s get started,” Steve smiled, clapping his hands together as he grabbed the first gift. “Yeah, I know you really liked the books when I showed you, so I figured you should see the movies, too,” Y/N nodded.

Rowling’s work.

On the way back to other activities, Sam and Bucky had been caught under the mistletoe AGAIN, throwing Peter out of the running and skyrocketing Y/N to the winning circle since the two of them marched over to Steve after their next kiss in order to drag him around with them in case.

“Guess you’ll be getting that blaster after all!” Shuri laughed. “Thankfully, I had already built it. I was gonna give it to you on your birthday, but this works, too.”

“Oh, it definitely works for me,” Y/N giggled, thumbing at the necklace Peter had given her. Overall, this was a fantastic Christmas…
